title: Milvus makes it easy to add similarity search to your applications.
desc: Store, index, and manage massive embedding vectors generated by deep neural networks and other machine learning (ML) models.

multimodal.title: Multimodal Image Search
multimodal.desc: Upload images and edit text to enhance intuitive image searches using advanced retrieval technology.

imgSearch.title: Image Search
imgSearch.desc: Images made searchable. Instantaneously return the most similar images from a massive database.

ossChat.title: OSSChat
ossChat.desc: Enhanced ChatGPT with documentation, issues, blog posts, community Q&A as knowledge bases. Built for every community and developer.

chemicalSearch.title: Chemical Structure Search
chemicalSearch.desc: Blazing fast similarity search, substructure search, or superstructure search for a specified molecule.

prompts.success: Thank you, you have been added to our mailing list!
prompts.warning: One second! We're taking you there...
